text: Ram Yadav may refer to: * Ram Baran Yadav (born 1948), Nepali politician and former President of Nepal * Ram Chandra Yadav (born 1961), Indian politician * Ram Gopal Yadav (born 1946), Indian politician and Member of Parliament * Ram Naresh Yadav (1928–2016), Indian politician and former Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh * Ram Sharan Yadav (born 1926), Indian politician and Member of Parliament
title: Ram Yadav
